BasicInfo.short: UberCloud is the online community, marketplace & softwaree container factory for technical computing & SaaS in public and private clouds

Products.name: UberCloud SaaS for Software Providers
Products.description: With UberCloud Software Containers ISVs and in-house software providers can build their own SaaS service and business

Products.name: UberCloud Application Containers for technical computing based on Docker
Products.description: UberCloud Containers ease packageability, portability, accessability, usability, of software & computing resources, on demand, in any cloud

Products.name: UberCloud Online Marketplace
Products.description: UberCloud Marketplace offers engineers, scientists, and their service providers technical computing solutions on demand, in any cloud
